1.name: Broken Blossoms or The Yellow Man and the Girl
1.description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

2.name: Male and Female
2.description: Lady Mary Lasenby is a spoiled maiden who always gets her way until shipwrecked with her butler, then learns which qualities are really admirable in a person.

3.name: J'accuse
3.description: The story of two men, one married, the other the lover of the other's wife, who meet in the trenches of the First World War, and how their tale becomes a microcosm for the horrors of war.

4.name: Anders als die Andern
4.description: Two male musicians fall in love, but blackmail and scandal makes the affair take a tragic turn.

5.name: Anne of Green Gables
5.description: Anne Shirley, an orphan, is taken into the lives of a generous farmer and his sister. She grows from an adventuresome young lass into a charming and much sought-after young lady.

6.name: Don't Change Your Husband
6.description: Leila Porter comes to dislike her husband James, a glue king who is always eating onions and looking sloppy. But after she divorces him and marries two-timing playboy Schuyler Van Sutphen the now-reformed James looks pretty good.

7.name: Die Puppe
7.description: Because the Baron of Chanterelle wants to preserve his family line, he forces his timid nephew Lancelot to choose one of the village maidens to wed. Lancelot flees to a monastery to escape ...                See full summary »

8.name: Madame DuBarry
8.description: The story of Madame DuBarry, the mistress of Louis XV of France, and her loves in the time of the French revolution.

9.name: True Heart Susie
9.description: Susie, a plain young country girl, secretly loves a neighbor boy, William. She believes in him and sacrifices much of her own happiness to promote his own ambitions, all without his ...                See full summary »

10.name: Daddy-Long-Legs
10.description: An orphan discovers that she has an anonymous benefactor who is willing to pay her college tuition, unaware he's the same man who has been romantically pursuing her.

11.name: Blind Husbands
11.description: An Austrian officer sets out to seduce a neglected young wife.

12.name: Die Spinnen, 1. Teil - Der Goldene See
12.description: Kay Hoog finds a message that indicates that some Incas are still alive, but the secret organisation "Die Spinnen" wants the Incas' gold....

13.name: Die Austernprinzessin
13.description: An American heiress seeks the hand of an impoverished German prince.

14.name: Harakiri
14.description: The Buddhist priest wants the Daughter of the Daimyo to become a priestess at the Forbidden Garden. The Daimyo thinks if he were in Europe that his daughter should decide on her own, but he...                See full summary »

15.name: A Romance of Happy Valley
15.description: John Logan leaves his parents and sweetheart in bucolic Happy Valley to make his fortune in the city. Those he left behind become miserable and beleaguered in his absence, but after several...                See full summary »

16.name: Herr Arnes pengar
16.description: Three Scottish officers, including Sir Archi, murder Sir Arne and his household for a coffin filled with gold. The only survivor is Elsalill, who moves to relatives in Marstrand. There she ...                See full summary »

17.name: Ravished Armenia
17.description: Aurora Mardiganian, a young and beautiful Armenian girl, lives with her parents in the Turkish city of Havpoul. Her father, a prosperous merchant, was preparing to send her to the West to ...                See full summary »

18.name: Dalagang bukid
18.description: This is the first Filipino feature-length film made by a Filipino director regarded as "Father of Filipino Movies" and is now lost forever. Dalagang Bukid is a story about a young flower ...                See full summary »

19.name: Unheimliche Geschichten
19.description: A demon, a reaper, and a supernatural prostitute read gothic short stories and act them out.

20.name: The Grim Game
20.description: Jailed unjustly for a murder he did not commit, a young man uses his amazing powers of escape to free himself and pursue the actual killers, who hold his fiancée captive.

21.name: Præsidenten
21.description: The judge in a Danish town sees his illegitimate daughter facing a trial for the murder of her newborn child, and is rather sure that she will be sentenced to death. She became pregnant ...                See full summary »

22.name: The Miracle Man
22.description: A gang of crooks evade the police by moving their operations to a small town. There the gang's leader encounters a faith healer and uses him to scam gullible public of funds for a supposed ...                See full summary »

23.name: When the Clouds Roll by
23.description: Psychiatrist Dr. Ulrich Metz attempts to drive Daniel Brown to suicide.

24.name: The Mother and the Law
24.description: A re-edited version of the 'modern' story from Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages (1916).

25.name: Scarlet Days
25.description: A romantic bandit named Alvarez, wanted for raids on the mining camps of the California gold rush in 1849, is reformed by the love of a good woman.

27.name: The Lost Battalion
27.description: A battalion of the U.S. Army's 77th Division penetrates deep into the Argonne Forest of France during the First World War. The battalion becomes surrounded and holds out for six long days, ...                See full summary »

28.name: The Red Lantern
28.description: Mahlee and Blanche Sackville are half-sisters, Blanche the daughter of an Englishman and his wife, Mahlee of the Englishman and his Chinese mistress. Mahlee rejects her people and attempts ...                See full summary »

29.name: Back to God's Country
29.description: A woman finds herself all alone in a remote harbor with the man responsible for the murder of her father. With seemingly nobody around to protect her, she has to be resourceful.

30.name: The First Men in the Moon
30.description: The inventor of a space sphere flies to the moon and is marooned by a crooked financier.

31.name: Behind the Door
31.description: A German-American naval officer takes revenge against the German submarine commander who brutalized his wife.

32.name: Nerven
32.description: Doubt and uncertainty ensue when the figurehead of a rebellion goes to court for an alleged rape.

33.name: For Better, for Worse
33.description: Dr. Edward Meade and friend Richard Burton both love Sylvia Norcross. Both enlist in the military, but Meade stays back to care for deformed children. Sylvia thinks him a coward and marries...                See full summary »

34.name: The Wicked Darling
34.description: A slum girl is forced to steal for a living. After she swipes a rich society's matron's necklace, she hides out at the home of a man who turns out to be the socialite's former fiance.

35.name: The Delicious Little Devil
35.description: A poor hat-check girl loses her job and is forced to get a job as a dancer at a roadhouse. There she falls in love with the son of a rich businessman. The boy's father, believing her to be ...                See full summary »

36.name: Der Knabe in Blau
36.description: Thomas von Weerth lives as the last descendant of an aristocratic family in the decayed castle. He is fascinated by the picture, 'The Boy in Blue', which shows the so-called Death Emerald.

37.name: Halbblut
37.description: The story of a man destroyed by love.

38.name: Getting Mary Married
38.description: Young Mary feels like a prisoner in the New York apartments of her step-father John Bussard but everything changes when her heartless guardian dies in an accident. Mary is left a fortune ...                See full synopsis »

39.name: Sången om den eldröda blomman
39.description: Olof Koskela is the son of a rich farmer. He seduces young girls at random, until an inconsistent gesture rushes him away from home and his carefree lifestyle. Based on the 1905 novel by Finnish author Johannes Linnankoski.

40.name: Johnny Get Your Gun
40.description: Sing Johnny Get Your Gun in the Style of "Gibson Miller Band". Stingray Karaoke Country, 80'S & 90'S, 1994, English, Key E.

42.name: Die Pest in Florenz
42.description: Suddenly appearing in Florence, an evil seductress causes Cesare, the city's ruler, and his son to both fall madly in love with her. The son, killing his father before an order to torture ...                See full summary »

43.name: The Sentimental Bloke
43.description: A down-at-heal ex-convict undergoes an epiphany as he experiences the love of a good woman for the first time.

44.name: The Hoodlum
44.description: A spoiled young rich girl is forced by misfortune to fight for survival in the slums and alleys, where she becomes involved with all manner of unpleasantness.

45.name: Meyer aus Berlin
45.description: A bumbling, self-indulgent husband goes on a vacation away from his wife. There he meets a popular, attractive young woman also on a vacation. Both go on a mountain climb which is going to be far from an ideal adventure.

47.name: Yankee Doodle in Berlin
47.description: Behind enemy lines, Captain Bob White disguises himself as a woman in order to fool members of the German High Command, including the Kaiser himself.

48.name: Atonement
48.description: Young Laura Hamilton turns down a marriage proposal from Vincent Carlson and marries Theodore Proctor, a bank president. Proctor's financially strapped brother asks him for help, and he has...                See full summary »

49.name: Victory
49.description: Axel Heyst, an uncommitted wanderer, has settled on an island in the South Seas. He takes pity on a troubled young woman, Lena, and gives her refuge on her island. But the piratical Mr. ...                See full summary »

50.name: The Girl Who Stayed at Home
50.description: Story of two brothers who go off to France to fight in World War I, the women who love them and an American expatriate living in France who rallies behind his former country.
